content: this pattern is my version of a simple granny square others may have slight variations in some of the steps but the final product usually works out the same a granny square can be used for making little squares or larger ones simply continue the pattern for as many rounds as desired to sew together for blankets cushion covers shawls or scarves use any number of colours in any number of combinations any yarn with crochet hook to match yarn weight can be used gauge is not important for this pattern the only additional material required is a darning needle with which to weave in ends
